targets.query: SELECT count("name") FROM "tag-veeam-lyon" WHERE ("tag"::tag = 'No_Veeam_Bck_Tags') AND "name" !~ /_PRA/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(previous)
SELECT distinct("name") FROM "tag-veeam-lyon" WHERE ("tag"::tag = 'No_Veeam_Bck_Tags') AND "name" !~ /_PRA/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
